website_summaries.verdict: A budget-friendly baseboard heater that continuously emits heat.
pros: Steel sheathed heating element and steel construction ensure the baseboard heater is built to last
cons: Requires a thermostat, which is not included

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn't suck up electric like older heater, very energy efficant. Very easy wipe able surface. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Direct replacement.
customer_reviews.text: This isn't a fancy product, and I left the "temperature control" star blank, because it doesn't come with one. Works well, keeps our bathroom warm on those cold winter mornings.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis G. Bledsoe

customer_reviews.title: On Time and As Expected
customer_reviews.text: The baseboard heater arrived on time and matched the replaced heater perfectly. Looks and works great.
customer_reviews.author: coosbeach

customer_reviews.title: Works great, looks great
customer_reviews.text: Works great, looks great and absolutely no sound. I like these baseboard heaters and will purchase additional heaters
customer_reviews.author: Mongolrat

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: works pretty good considering the space that it does't take up... 750 watts wish it was more
customer_reviews.author: Jay Agee

customer_reviews.title: saved money on Amazon.  get it faster vs. special order in stores
customer_reviews.text: saved $10 over big box store special order price and received it in a few days instead of weeks. no brainer. puts out 2,560 Btu's draws 3.1 amps pair with Cadet by Honeywell TH106 Single Pole Electronic Programmable. 120/240V 16.7 AMP Wall Mount Thermostat for Baseboard or In-Wall Fan Heaters, White programmable thermostat for energy savings at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Optimal Prime

customer_reviews.title: Helps a little..
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t provide much heat especially for being 240V.. Also really should have a child proof screen covering the heating element.
customer_reviews.author: jeff clark

customer_reviews.title: ... perfectly is the small space I had and works great.
customer_reviews.text: this 3 foot heater fits perfectly is the small space I had and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little heater!
customer_reviews.text: This heater fit just perfect to replace one than was installed 35 yrs ago. I want to replace 3 of my larger units also 35 years old and I would also purchase them from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Hoilien

customer_reviews.title: Thank you so much. I have my baseboard heater ...
customer_reviews.text: Thank you so much. I have my baseboard heater in my plant room. I finally have the temperature the way I want it.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Dunnagan

customer_reviews.title: Nice small unit for a bathroom
customer_reviews.text: This is an attractive baseboard heater that works efficiently in a bathroom. Best to have an electrician install for 240 volts, and remember to buy the dial - thermostat to go with it. It was a quick job, and we've been happy with ease of use. You don't need to go to the trouble of having a smart thermostat if you keep it on low most of the time. (If you ever need to turn it up, i.e. during a shower, it would heat up quickly.)
customer_reviews.author: Lori A.

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality, preparation of the chassis to route power to the unit took the majority of the time.
customer_reviews.text: These were great replacements for baseboards from the 60s. My only complaint would be that it required considerable effort to remove the blanks from the chassis in order to route cable into the unit. The removal of the blank took the majority of the time in the installation.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny B

customer_reviews.title: For years I have trusted Cadet electric baseboard heaters. ...
customer_reviews.text: For years I have trusted Cadet electric baseboard heaters. The only reason I purchased this to replace one I already owned was because the renter's animals found it a convenient 'fire hydrant' when they were left alone too long. The resulting rust from multiple urine applications is something the manufacturer certainly cannot foresee to include in their instructional manual as 'Things Not To Do'.
customer_reviews.author: Rod Merrill

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement at a great price for the rusty one that had seen the end of its' days.
customer_reviews.author: 72Camaro

customer_reviews.title: Lots of heat
customer_reviews.text: Well built no sharp edges like the one I replaced
customer_reviews.author: Lloyddverrill

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described, easy install and provides strong warmth to room!
customer_reviews.author: brett

customer_reviews.title: Great heater.
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation and very quiet. So far no noise when the unit is producing heat. Completely satisfied with this heater.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Lewis

customer_reviews.title: satisfied
customer_reviews.text: installation a snap; looks good and works well; had to order this item as this size wasn't stocked locally and am glad i did.
customer_reviews.author: David Williams

product_meta.title: Cadet Manufacturing 09952 240-Volt White Baseboard Hardwire Electric Zone Heater, 750-Watt, 36-Inch
product_meta.description: Cadet Manufacturing 09952 White Baseboard Hardwire Electric Zone Heater 240V, 750W, 36" requires a thermostat. 25 gauge steel, 20 gauge junction box with ground, all metal and powder coated. UL listed.
feature_bullets: 20 Gauge Junction Box With Ground, All Metal, And Powder Coated
20 Gauge Junction Box With Ground, All Metal and Powder Coated
